context_of_use: This use case allows customers and users to view report content and download or export reports for offline use.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to access reports for personal use
user: wants to analyze data offline
description: This use case enables customers and users to view and download reports for offline analysis.
triggering_event: The customer or user requests to view reports.
preconditions: The customer or user is authenticated in the system.
postconditions: The customer or user has successfully viewed and downloaded the reports.
assumptions: The system has the capability to generate and store reports.
The customer and user have the necessary permissions to access reports.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to view reports.
The system shall allow users to download reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of reports available for viewing and downloading.
main_flow: 2. customer → System allows customer to select a report to view.
3. customer → System displays the selected report content.
4. customer → System provides an option to download the report.
5. customer → System downloads the report for offline use.
6. user → System allows user to select a report to download.
7. user → System downloads the report for offline analysis.
